com.atakmap.android.bloodhound.ui

Class BloodHoundRouteWidget

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget
        • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MapWidget2
          • com.atakmap.android.widgets.MarkerIconWidget
            • com.atakmap.android.bloodhound.ui.BloodHoundRouteWidget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MapWidget.OnClickListener, MapWidget.OnLongPressListener

    public class BloodHoundRouteWidget
extends MarkerIconWidget
implements MapWidget.OnClickListener, MapWidget.OnLongPressListener
    A button to press that toggles the bloodhound tool from "R&B line" mode to "route mode".
